Class Util

extends Object

      • getPlugin

        public <T extends Plugable> T getPlugin(Class<T> pluginClass)
        Gets the plugin with the matching unique plugin name and the matching plugin class, that has been registered in the META-INF/services Folder under the fully qualified interface or class name.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The data type of the plugin.
        Parameters:
        pluginClass - The registered plugin class.
        Returns:
        The matching plugin.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Is thrown if no correspondending plugin is found.
